original_text: And they shall make an ark of shittim wood: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.
korean_text: 그들은 조각목으로 궤를 짜되 길이는 두 규빗 반, 너비는 한 규빗 반, 높이는 한 규빗 반이 되게 하고

sentences.original_text: And they shall make an ark of shittim wood:
two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof,
and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof,
and a cubit and a half the height thereof.
